testcase.name: rest API Testing
testcase.system-out: Given url "http://dummy.restapiexample.com/api/v1/employees" .............. passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * def temp = response ..................................................... passed * print "srini", temp ..................................................... passed And response.status == "sucess" ........................................... passed And response.data == "#string" ............................................ passed And print(response.data[0].employee_name) ................................. passed And response.data[0].employee_name == "Tiger Nixon" ....................... passed * match response.data[0].employee_name contains "Tiger" ................... passed
